arts.ttl: Rangers to face either Viktoria Plzeň or Servette if successful in UCL tie with Panathinaikos
arts.sum: If Rangers get past the Greek side, then the next hurdle in their quest to reach the League Phase will be the winners of the Viktoria Plzen v Servette tie. Viktoria Plzen are Czech, and Servette are from Switzerland. Russell Martin’s side get their competitive season underway on Tuesday when they host Panathinaikos at Ibrox in the second qualifying round.
